website_summaries.verdict: This model has brushes designed for pet hair and has a longer run time than several other models.
pros: Works with Amazon Alexa for voice control
WiFi connected for remote app control
Runs up to 120 minutes on a full charge
Combo brush and spiral blade brush
LaserSmart mapping scans and maps room
Returns to charging station if necessary to complete job
Suction power cleans debris from even thick carpet
cons: Has difficulty "seeing" and reacting to reflective surfaces like chrome

customer_reviews.title: It may not work in your house, not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had many neato's over the years, that have worked for almost a year each. I ordered 3 for my new house, only to be told that the reason they are not working is because I have too many windows in this house....THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE. It is useless to me and after about 30 emails with crazy suggestions back and forth they still will not take any back even though they admit it is a problem with their machine. There is no way to return this machine and I ordered 3 of the most expensive type. And the app does not work either.
customer_reviews.author: Meb

customer_reviews.title: Loving My Ebony  Wood Floors Again...but trouble in paradise
customer_reviews.text: It's only been two days and I'm smitten. Rosie (my bot) came out the box ready to go. We had some minor charging issues soon fixed with Neatos customer support. Most of all my dark wood floors are cleaned 2x/week....buh-bye dust bunnies! No scuffs on the wall, no scratches on the floor, no dust streaks....well done Neato! -------- Updated 3 weeks later....software update is a royal hassle. You need a special type of 2.0 flash drvive, a USB adapter, and a lot patience. This was a major hassle and felt so 1990s. Dropped to 3 stars (from 5) . Also the suction is waining. Not as cool 3wks in.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthian

customer_reviews.title: This WILL break and Neato won't accept returns!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months, then just stopped working! It took a full month until I received a replacement, which also STOPPED WORKING after 3 months! The fun part: THERE IS NO RETURNS (unless your third robot also breaks!) Basically, Neato's strategy is to keep you in the replacement loop until your 1 year warranty runs out and you're left with a robot that doesn't work and you paid a few hundred bucks for! I sew MANY people in the EXACT SAME SITUATION complaining online (either here, or other forums). Dear Neato: if you have a product that breaks every 3 month, you ONLY accept replacements, but keep your warranty from the date of purchase, you know you're not legit!
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: it breaks and the warranty is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this robot I loved it. It lasted a little under 2 months. It took weeks to get it replaced, and the 2nd one lasted only 2 weeks. Again, it took weeks for the company to replace it. The one I have now climbs everything and always gets stuck. it still works. We'll see. Update. Do not buy Neato products! # robots, and the longest lasting one was 10 months, and the warranty only covers from a year from purchase, so I spent almost $700 and had a vaccuum for 10 months. I am disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: C. Colby

customer_reviews.title: it is not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: 1: robot is not recognize the base all the time and do not comeback for charging when is the case, even there is a clear path 2: filters and big brush already changed after 1 month of use 3: small brush is coming out all the time 4: robot is climbing the furniture and spoil it bumping the chairs, furniture, chairs.. 5: it spread all the dust around instead vacuum it 6:maybe just my robot is doing all above mentioned? 7: I claimed to seller the issues, they just gave a NEATO phone number that never worked. 8: not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: BRASOV

customer_reviews.title: Love❤️
customer_reviews.text: As a mother, wife, and business owner with a household of 6 people...I may cry writing this review. Best thing I have ever purchased for my self! If your sceptical about the price? In my life it's worth it's weight in gold! Is it perfect? No, but what is?? If your life is as busy as mine, this beauty is definitely for you. I must be getting old, never thought I would be this damn excited about a vacuum " I need to get out more" ps my first review EVER
customer_reviews.author: jody wicker

customer_reviews.title: Longtime Roomba User Won Over by Botvac
customer_reviews.text: I've been using robot vacuums and moppers for nine years. All of my prior vacuuming robots were Roombas. After reading reviews, I decided to try the Botvac Connected. It's a game changer. It's more effective at picking up dirt and hair, AND it doesn't damage my walls and furniture by repeatedly bumping into them. (I just had to repaint all the baseboards in my house because of the marks the Roomba had left.) The app functionality is great since I dock my Botvac under furniture so I don't have to look at it. Also, I can start vacuuming from my watch? We're living in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Steffel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: After much research I went with this robot.. I loved it. It picked up quite a bit. I never minded when it couldn't dock itself, I would just help it. My problem is well well well, it died.. Month 13 on a 12 month warrenty. 600 dollars later, and just not worth the money to pay for shipping and fixing. I found a no frills model of the irobot roomba at clearance price at a qvc outlet. I don't think it's as good as the neato, but I paid 130..... I won't cry the same way if it dies after a year.
customer_reviews.author: mittmott

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Neato vacuums for several years as they do the best job getting up pet fur because their "rollers" are not reliant on bristled brushes that get tangled with hair. I've had four Neato models (we have two homes) and this one is THE BEST. It never gets lost or stuck and it runs for about an hour on a charge. Like this ones filter the best too. I am awestruck at how much fur and dust and other stuff it removes from my floors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning, poor reliability.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum changed our life with how well it picked up the dog hair and we only run it three times a week. If this review was just about cleaning ability it would be five stars without question, but it isn't. We have owned this for two and a half years and have already had to send it in for repair which was a little over $200. Now I've had to order the part that the dust bin latches to because it doesn't latch anymore which causes it to beep thinking the dust bin isn't installed. I feel like after paying so much for something that it should last longer than this. The reliability has been very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Spadowski

customer_reviews.title: Junk Product
customer_reviews.text: Junk after a year of use. Constantly gets lost around the house and cleans the same areas over and over again. I’ve replaced several brushes early and it consistently errors out with the “clean my brush” message. Forget about running it on a schedule, it can barely complete my living room without stopping due to an error. Customer service is useless, they’ll beat you down with wasteful diagnostics just to send you on your way without a fix. I’ve hard reset the unit numerous times and even replaced the battery. Complete waste of money. I’ll be buying a Roomba as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I just got this product yesterday 3/21. Why is ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product yesterday 3/21. Why is it so difficult to connect to the wifi and iphone app? I have already spent enough time and spent time on chat with Neato and still not successful. If this does not work, I will be returning this product. I am giving it a last try!! Update 6/28 - I returned the above unit to Neato company and got a replacement (same) unit. Again same issue where the side brush stopped working. I had to return it because the side brush had stopped working. Now on the replacement unit too, the same issue. What a crappy product, save yourself some time and get maybe Roomba or something better
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Gets stuck A LOT, I have to be next to it to keep "helping" it. I contacted customer service and I've been in conversations with them for more than 5 months. I sent it in for service and came back with a new filter and brush (this vacuum's filter it's really bad, gets fill pretty easily) and still would not respect the magnet boundaries around a rug, where it always get stuck. They won't return your money/change it for a new product. I would spend my money somewhere else, there is plenty to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Belén Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Vac'd approx 1000sqf 3 days per week for pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine Nov 29 2015. All worked well for 11 months and the side brush quit working. Neato sent me a replacement and 14 months later that side brush quit working on the new unit. Neato suggested I send it for repairs that I would need to pay for. This unit does not clean anything like it should without the side brush working. There are many better options out there for less money. Lessons cost money and good ones cost a lot. Keep looking for a better option than Neato.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: The APP does not work in other countries. Be aware if you a foreigner buying it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to be used in Brazil when traveling in the USA. The NEATO APP is locked geographically. So the menu of control on the APP is not useful. I cannot update without the ios or Android App. Besides that, it has two functions only. House Cleaning or Square Cleaning, he goes random and trying to clean all, it takes a good time to clean the entire house. It seems like a smart device, but I think the corners it has a problem with cleaning or managing chairs and table feet. I want to know how it is with the APP. However, without the app, it seems an ordinary vacuum robot.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Q.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS VACUUM - they will die within the first year - NO warranty support from Neato.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Neato Botvac Connected robots - both failed after a short time. They get into some state whereby they leave the dock and loop through power-up and power-down cycles, then "Please press Ok to continue". Once this starts, they will never run a cleaning cycle again. Both failed well within warranty period. The first one failed in time that I could return it through Amazon. I got no help from Neato. And no warranty support.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Limited Lifetime
customer_reviews.text: This product functions extremely well for about a year and then it ceases to work. More specifically, it would no longer leave the charging base by more than a foot to clean the house, cycle three times and then beep incessantly until either turned off or returned to the base. The first time this happened it was replaced free of charge after jumping through a large amount of hoops. Then the replacement has the same malfunction one year approximately after it arrived. Now though they are not replacing the item but are going to send it off for repairs. Honestly, I would avoid this product, the temporary convenience offered is not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing when I first got it then it broke and I had to send it back to Neato. I will say that Neato's support is amazing and they sent me a brand new one within a week of receiving my damaged one. I do wish this model had the barriers you could set in the app instead of laying down the magnetic strip. Other than that it is great on hardwood, area rugs, and tile. Cleans my whole downstairs in about 20 minutes right before I get home from work every day. The bin is pretty big and I usually only have to empty it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mibix

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model for over 2.5 years now and it's still going strong. There was an issue with the wheel sensors but the amazon insurance fixed it within a week. That has been the only real issue we have had. Neato has cleaned up at 9pm every night almost the entire house for 2.5 years now and on some days cleaned the bedrooms in the mornings then the remainder later that night. The function to use the app to drive it works well and very responsive but never really had a need to do so. Keep your neato clean by wiping the sensors and cleaning the filter/bristles and it will clean your house for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sauer

customer_reviews.title: so not a great record so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now so I think I can write a review. After getting this I immediately set a schedule to run 3 times a week. In the 3 weeks it's run the scheduled cleans successfully 2 or 3 times ... so not a great record so far. It's sent me battery low messages because it gets to the base but doesn't connect right (I guess?) It's also sent dustbin full messages a couple of times when the dustbin is just about empty. I got this because I didn't like having a Roomba bouncing off the walls. I think I would return this if I still could and get the Roomba 980.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Robot Vacuum!!! Works on Pile carpet!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only smart vacuum I like after trying the bobs weep and roomba (not the 980)... this one I named "Sentinel" because it methodically seeks out dirt and climbs thing's like floor panels,mats and fan bases. Works extremely well on my pike rug in my bedroom and every other robot I've tried were unable to vacuum it. No issue there. It does get stuck under my couch but otherwise I'm impressed. The app could use a few tweaks but I really love this robot!!! :)))
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: The good is that it does a very good job of covering the area and it has strong suction and picks up things along the baseboards . The bad is that often times when it returns to base it doesn't connect ride and when I need to use it it's low on battery and I have to wiggle it around until it connects , then wait for it to recharge . I downloaded the app for my iPhone and I've had to reset it and go through the process at least three times because it keeps coming disconnected for some unknown reason . For the price I shouldn't be having these problems
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! GET A ROOMBA
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have had and both have had issues with the dust bin. The dust bin will eventually pop up, which disengages the switch to keep it running. Any slight bump on your tile or divot and the bin pops up just enough to disengage the robot and stop it from finishing. You have to baby sit it because of that. This would be an amazing robot if it were not for that. Customer service is below par as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T.

customer_reviews.title: We freaking love this!
customer_reviews.text: We freaking love this! Picks up Labrador hair. Every. Damn. Day. It doesn’t replace our big vacuum, but it does clean our hardwood every day and collects all of our black lab hair. Clean the filter every day and replace once a month. ***cleanability is a little bad. There aren’t any “how-to” videos on how to take apart. This thing apparenly, and literally, scared the crap out of my dog and it ran over Lab dung. It took a long time to clean because I couldn’t figure out how to take the wheels out to clean and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Great robotic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The balance between cleaning power and navigation on the Neatos are great. Originally I had irobot 650 and it was terrible at cleaning and got stuck often. Then I got a Samsung powerbot and it's cleaning was amazing but it would always get stuck on rugs and rarely made it back to the charger. The neato cleans great and almost always makes it back unless it sucks up a sock or toy. Also love how it shows it's cleaning map each time. I even have an old neato xv21, the LCD screen is intermittently working, but the little vacuum still cleans the downstairs carpet like a champ. Got a pic of both in action.
customer_reviews.author: vettedriver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After a few difficulties with set up and mapping out our house I can say that I LOVE this bot vac! It goes in straight lines and gets dirt I can’t get with the big vacuum. I ran it two days in a row and then vacuumed with my full size shark and my canister was almost empty! And we have a high shedding dog in the house. I am thoroughly pleased! The battery goes for 2 hours on the eco setting and 1 hour on the turbo setting. It had to recharge once to do our entire house (2200 sqf). Would definitely recommend for keeping the floors clean in between big cleaning. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect machine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vaccum robot! We have a dog in the house and this vaccum is our saver! It picks up the dirt and hairs with little effort. The app works very well. I found missing the option to restrict its access to certain areas of the house using the app. Also the robot is made from plastic which is scratched during vaccuming. I think the company should consider building it with a more dureable material. Also a mechanism that would restrict the neato from ever reaching wet areas would be safer. Other that that, we are truely satisfied with the performance of this machine
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing after one year of usage - BIG ISSUE WITH CUSTOMER SERVICE BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: When at the beginning everything worked fine i've had no complains... When the problem started this is where the real issues with this company's services started... Two major hardware issues 1) Laser malfunction 2) battery charging is not working. When contacted the customer service the only thing they were interested in is to check if my warranty period is finished... And when they realized it is couple of month over the year they where happy to inform me that they have NOTHING TO DO ABOUT THAT directing me to local dealers... Customer service is one of the most important areas innovative technologies should be focusing on so customers can feel protected while trying something new... BE AWARE
customer_reviews.author: YevgeniT

customer_reviews.title: I love my neato
customer_reviews.text: I love my neato. My kids named it "swiper". The first time I ran "swiper" he couldn't find his way back to base. Every time since then he has had no problem going back home. He goes under furniture, on all my floor types with no problems. The amount of dirt it picks up still amazes me. Sometimes I run it twice in the same day if we are home all day. If he gets stuck I get notified on my phone. I can start him up from anywhere with the app. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is OCD about floors being clean or just doesn't have time to vacuum as much as they'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Clay

customer_reviews.title: Don't. Just don't....
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cleaning ....... when it works. 5 months old and it lost the ability to determine where it was and would clean the same area over and over. Now it tells me to clean the brush repeatedly. I have cleaned the brush and brush moving parts thoroughly to no avail. Neato's support is a joke. It takes days to get a response and they can rarely be of any help.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: It Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: There is a learning curve, but not too steep. And you do need to pick up little doodads and things that might get grabbed. You do need to prepare the space otherwise things will get knocked over or pulled down. Once you police the area, turn the little beast loose and it will do a great job of standard cleaning. You obviously need to empty the trap more often than a standard cleaner, but the trap removes easily and I just drop the contents in a wastebasket as normal trash. Great time saver and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Cleans everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive results judging by the contents of the bin after a cleaning. We have one medium size dog. The Botvac picks up behind her like a robotic butler. Can navigate crowded rooms and still produce impressive results. Does a great job getting the dust bunnies hiding under beds, tables and other furniture. You'll still need to vacuum the vertical surfaces of your house and furniture. But, this tool provides an amazing head start on the house cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Murry

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 year review
customer_reviews.text: While we are generally satisfied we note an increased frequency of the neato getting stuck. It gets tangled up in chair legs under a table and it tries to climb lamp bases and similar obstacles. it has always done this but not it seems to be doing it more frequently. Alot more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worked good then got stupid. Now useless
customer_reviews.text: Reviseing review for last time. Do not buy this product period. Works fine for week or two then goes right down hill. Terrible item waste of good money. Doesn't even vac whole floor any more. Gets stuck constantly. It ended up in trash can where it belongs. Worst product i have bought in years. Doesn't even deserve one star.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Non refundable
customer_reviews.text: Neato worked good at first, but it started giving me problems about a month and half after I received it. I tried to send it back and they told me it was non refundable. I’m very upset about this. So be very careful when buying this item
customer_reviews.author: coop

customer_reviews.title: This is life-changing
customer_reviews.text: I've got one long haired cat, a nine year old, and a four year old who is constantly bringing her sandbox in with her. Toys are on the floor, furniture moves around. I've had it for about a week now and I don't believe that I lived without it. It's not so much that it saves me time. Honestly, I didn't used to sweep/vacuum every day. Instead, I just lived in dust and cathair. Now I don't have to do this. I use it every day and I can't believe how much gets i]picked up in the dustbin, even when I run it every day.
customer_reviews.author: David Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love my robot
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I wanted to invest the money in a "gadget" but decided to try. I looked at the irobot but didn't like the price so decided to try the Neato. With two shedding dogs I was looking at this to do the maintenance vacuuming of dog hair. R2D2 (I know not original but this reminds me of the R2D2 from star wars) has run now three times and I am impressed. It picks up a lot of hair and I don't have tumbleweeds running around my house. I will still need to vacuum with an upright periodically but this makes the frequency much less. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This predict is terrible, extremely unreliable and frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible, don't buy it. I have had mine since September of last year. It NEVER completes a cleaning cycle without intervention. The unit cannot find its base for recharging, so it always dies and then beeps for help. The beeping is constant, extremely annoying. The brushes also always require cleaning, even when they don't look dirty, it won't work with one of the brushes anymore, so I had to change to the spare. There is no visible wear on the brush. I can't believe the price of this item verses its value, this is a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: KJSA

customer_reviews.title: New to Neato. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm glad no one saw how much dirt Neato picked up on its first run through just part of my house. The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is that I have had it less than one week. I will update as I use it more. I did have trouble connecting with my cell phone; however, customer service was very patient and helpful . . . wouldn't give up until we got it connected.
customer_reviews.author: TXMambo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working just out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first year. Then it would disengage from the charging station and then beep that there was an error and just remain there. Eventually it started working again for roughly 3 cleaning cycles and now it won't even turn on. *When it was "working great" it got stuck everywhere, would clean only some rooms, and was extremely loud so I wouldn't recommend it even if it didn't die
customer_reviews.author: RLGod

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.  Spend the money and buy it. Just do it.
customer_reviews.text: This will change your world. Buy one, name it, and make it part of your family. I had so many doubts before I bought it and now I don't know why I waited so long. Yes it's a lot of money. It was worth every penny and I would buy it again. The convenience of having your entire home vacuumed multiple times a week while you do ZERO work is amazing. It picks up all the pet hair, transferes from floor to carpet with ease, and the pets are not even bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: DARWIN MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccuum, great customer service, somewhat consistent
customer_reviews.text: We call ours Nemo and we got it because we have a dog that sheds A LOT. If Nemo runs twice a day you would never know that our dog loses most of its hair daily. We've had a few problems with Nemo but every time, Neato customer service is great at resolving it at no cost to us. Also, customer service is wonderful about showing that they care about resolving the issue. Nemo works reliably most of the time but sometimes gets stuck on nothing. My one complaint is that you can't program Nemo to run twice a day. I have to run it once and then it can follow its schedule for the second run.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Best little Botvac!
customer_reviews.text: Best Botvac to date. With two long haired dogs and two long haired cats, cleaning has always been a problem. Rosie fills up that bin every time and we use her three times per week. Only issue is that we have a lot of furniture and Rosie spends a lot of time working around the legs, thus taking several recharges to do the whole house. Just an environmental issue to work around.
customer_reviews.author: Mantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my robot vacuum. Just can't figure out how to get the software upgrade to work right. I have had this for a while now. I called in to the help desk and they helped me get the software updated. This vaccuum is better than my upright Dyson. It works as advertised and really makes my life easier. You can not go wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Leek

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed - rarely knows where its base is, bumps so hard into walls it knocks paint off, loudest appliance in our house.. That being said it does clean well, but not as intuitively as suggested. Constantly needing attention. I wish I had bought a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: ISB

customer_reviews.title: This one is cheaper than Rumba and more efficient than Rumba!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 months. Works well. No issues. Is more efficient than the Rumba because this baby sweeps in a pattern, not at random, thus increasing your battery life. Regardless of what you buy, a little prep is needed for a more efficient run. (case in point....visit youtube and type in "robot vacuum poop"). This is a funny video, whether you have pets at home or not.
customer_reviews.author: FanTom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine.
customer_reviews.text: My first VacBot... It's great! I use it every 3 days or so and even though I'm in an apartment with the windows closed, no animals, and I leave my shoes at the door; it always has a fair amount of dust and dirt in the container. My friends are always very impressed when "Harvey" texts me that's it's done cleaning, stuck under something or needs the bin emptied. A good product, better than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Castroman

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever live without Neato Botvac Connected?
customer_reviews.text: Always considered myself to be a multi-tasker, but when I can pepare breakfast AND vacuum my house at the same time - well, SUPER-MULTI-TASKER. Love it! I'm a techno freak, anyway, and this is marvelous. I have 2 mini-long-haired daschunds - although I vacuum regularly, the Neato (which I have named Critter) found at least 3 puppies! It picks up hair fuzz we couldn't even see. Still need to educate it a bit (only had it 3 days and our house is octagon shaped) OR it needs to educate ME, but couldn't be happier. Great birthday present from my spouse!
customer_reviews.author: E. H. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: And then came NeatO'
customer_reviews.text: Schedule it and forget it, well almost. Loves that it gives me notifications to let me know if it gets stuck(trap itself in a room) or wants me to help it regurgitate a sock. Apart from that it's amazing, I just dust things off onto the floor knowing that it will pick it up in the next cycle. Good to have more time and lesser hassle for myself. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Neato is the best vacuum we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older Neato Botvac 80 with this one and it works circles around the old Botvac. Cleans longer and better. Battery charges faster. We moved our old Botvac upstairs to clean smaller rooms up there. The old one still works better than the roomba we tried from Sams over the Christmas holidays this year. Neato just has a better vacuum in my opinion. I did replace the battery in the Botvac 80 last year after 2 1/2 years of service. We have a little over 3000 sq feet that it cleans twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Gets lost. Always stuck. Won’t return to base. Poor customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this version of the neato for almost a year now. It requires constant babysitting, gets stuck on everything, cleans half a room then try’s to return to its base but gets lost. When I contact support about it they claim the sensors are dirty but that’s a garbage excuse for a garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is too much money to have wasted on this product and I wouldn't recommend it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but trouble with this item. I am constantly fighting with the product support folks to get it fixed. When I got tired of waiting, I fixed it myself and they tell me that I've voided the warranty. This is too much money to have wasted on this product and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. I am currently at the stage where they wont even return my messages. I've had enough and will be taking things into my own hands now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hagermann

customer_reviews.title: And its annoying chirps when it needs attention on the charging station ...
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's magic. But that's only 50 percent of the time. The others it gets stuck or outright quits in the middle of its run. Two stars is for the times it works. But for this price it needs to be much more consistent. And its annoying chirps when it needs attention on the charging station are the worst. It could be a software issue. But nothing I've tried has improved its performance or effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Poor brush design. Hair and particulates sooner or later end up jamming the motor.
customer_reviews.text: Botvac Connected has poorly designed brush connection to motor. It is very common for it to suck up hair and have hair caught between the brush roller and in the crevice where it connects to the motor. I had to get it replaced under warranty 6 months after use. And now same issue has arisen.
customer_reviews.author: swu

customer_reviews.title: Very good robot vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans whole floor of house, all rooms, wood floors and area rugs. Works it's way around obstacles and under furniture. Manual start or weekly schedule is very convenient. Picks up lots of cat hair. Easy to empty dust bin. Avoids falling down stairs. Returns to charging base when done. Also good at spot cleaning a small area. Communicates via wifi with mobile phone..
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Don't stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Botvac Connected robot in November of 2017 to clean a 1,000 sq. ft. space once a week. I have to say that while it was working I liked it. But last week, after less than two years on the job, the thing just started cycling on and off and wouldn't move. I performed all the recommended actions and Neato has just told me I'm SOL unless I want to pay to get it repaired. So that's $700 down the drain. Not impressed with their customer service, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: three bars

customer_reviews.title: More work than vacuuming yourself
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as I thought. Don't clean the place thoroughly and gets stuck in everything possible. If I have to do that much work to "prepare" the house (clean up cords or small items on the floor, tape down the carpet so the robot doesn't get stuck etc) I might as well do the vacuuming myself. Returned after 1 week of using
customer_reviews.author: An Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Notifications fixed with recent update, added a star
customer_reviews.text: If you set up enough no-go tape zones the robot can complete its run. It took a while to find all the problem areas. But now the robot is cleaning well and getting stuck less. I still wish the support was better but they seem to be overwhelmed. I think the newer models with virtual no-go liners would be a significant improvement.
customer_reviews.author: TCG

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss with repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Be wary buying this product. I bought mine in March 2018 and it stopped working. I just had to get both wheels and wheel motors replaced along with the small motor that turns a brush. To send it in to get an estimate was roughly $30 and the estimate came back at $240. At this point I am $100 off a new Vacuum if I was to purchase the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Botvac!!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great! the app could use some work though. it came 'unconnected' a few weeks ago and i can't get it paired up again but that's not so bad, since now i don't get pathetic messages from Isaac to come help him get unstuck. These things DO get stuck, but i just run mine 6 days a week and the floors stay a whole lot cleaner and i don't have the back pain i get from vacuuming all the time.. Wish i'd bought this years ago. Can't wait till they bring one out that will do baseboards!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie R.

customer_reviews.title: Neato is NEATO!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Our Neato, "Bob Wiggles" does a great job on our travertine floors and keeps the baseboard edges clean and dust free. You must pick up small items and low hanging skirts or curtains to insure it gets to the baseboards, but you would do it anyway with a regular vacuum. Fun to watch "Bob" back up to his base and "Wiggle" until it has the proper contact to recharge. I am on my first smart phone just 2 months ago, so not sure how much the App will work, but I am learning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gautreau

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was nice while it lasted. The problem is that it didn't last very long. Bought in November 2017 stopped working in January of 2020. Contacted Neato customer service and they refused to fix or repair. Wound not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect, and you need to order your house around your BotVac, but in general very pleased with this product. One point to note that I didn’t see mentioned any other reviews, if you have multihomed Wi-Fi (more than one access point) this device will not switch networks and will lose Wi-Fi connection when he gets out of range of the original access point.
customer_reviews.author: SteadyRollin'Man

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Saves me so much time. I still like to use a traditional vacuum on high traffic areas, but this guy does the majority of the floors. I especially like neat lines on the carpet when it's done.
customer_reviews.author: zaphod

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is our first robot. Wall-e is doing great. Had a issue at first setup with my samsung 6s but switchef to a old wifi only S3 no issues. UPDATE: Wall-E is working well but twice now he starts flashing his wifi bars. Interesting part my WIFI Access Point shows him connected. From research it has something to do with NEATO's cloud servers. Not Happy that this keeps a $700 device from performing it's basic function. Takes 15 minutes to re initialize.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love it, thanks
customer_reviews.text: So far when it comes to keeping junk off the floor and getting frustrated by the people who leave it there, call on the BVC! I've always been frustrated cleaning all the floors and the next day (or same day sometimes) when the kids/dogs/neighbors/friends/family leave mud/dirt/hair on the ground. Grabbing the broom, dustpan, etc is a pain. Now I see some debris left behind and simply call on the robot and it's gone. Love it, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: eternalp

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing i recommend the spiral brush if you dont have alot of pet her and want a deeper clean picks up much more dirt. It hasn't got stuck much only once love how close it gets to the wall with the side brush my only complaint would be the docking if you dont have it docked when you start it it wont dock it will just got to the spot where it started the clean cycle
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: My Neato worked great until about 2 weeks after the 1 year warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: My Neato worked great until about 2 weeks after the 1 year warranty expired. It just stopped working. Customer service told me I was on my own to have it repaired. Sorry, you pay $600-700 for a product and you would expect it to last more than a year. Now I'm on the hook for shipping my vacuum to a repair center and paying for costly repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Knauss

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, gets the cat fur
customer_reviews.text: Have had the Neato for 1 year, great purchase. It picks up cat fur well, does its thing from room to room and heads back to docking station when done. I got an extra magnetic strip to mark areas where I don't want it to pass thru, which is helpful. One occasion where I called Neato for customer support and they were terrific. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: upstategirl

customer_reviews.title: ... our new Neato for a few weeks now and love it. The wifi works great
customer_reviews.text: Have our new Neato for a few weeks now and love it. The wifi works great, we start the Neato before we get home after being gone a few days and no longer have to deal with the cat hairs on arrival. The wifi link also alerts if/when the unit stops or needs attention (like emptying the canister) The setup was simple and fast. The unit will run for about one hour before returning to its base to recharge. Then it automatically returns to where it left off and completes the entire house. It is great into corners and around the furniture legs. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We Love Our Neato Connected
customer_reviews.text: The best part about adding Rosie to our family is that she loves the fur balls let for her from our cats. Being able to walk around our house without spotting fur balls, even after we would vacuum with a standard vacuum, is wonderful. The cats haven't quite taken to her like their human counterparts but they will come around. Overall, we give this little robot a two thumbs up. My only complaint is locating a USB drive to update the vacuum, which I think should be included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JM Ognosky

customer_reviews.title: Prone to failure
customer_reviews.text: Liked this robot a lot initially. Used it twice weekly. It worked as advertised- until the warranty period expired. Within a week after the warranty ended - it stopped working - requested that it’s path be cleared and simply ran in little circles. We had the unit evaluated and were told it was a drive system issue. Expensive fix, but less than the cost of a new robot. We had the unit repaired- now same issue again within six months. We’re done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dye Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I received my robot timely and appeared in new condition. Was easy to set up and did a great job cleaning our floors, esp with all the dog hair from our lab puppy. Unfortunately after 4 months it could no longer clean the same section in one charge . Now at 5 months it won’t hold a charge at all. I am waiting to hear back from seller to see how this will be handled. The battery is around $100 which is supposed to last 12-18 months ? I’ll keep you posted on what happens. At that price, I could have bought a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: tx_runner

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bit of technology I have ever purchased. NEATO works great. It cleans very very well. It's easy to program too. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: The thing cleans beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: We had light brown floors and replaced them with black wood floors. There is a big difference in how it performs with the light colored wood over the dark colored one !! It worked flawlessly with the lighter floors. Since we have darker floors, it has a difficult time finding it's charging station a lot of the time! That's our only complaint though. The thing cleans beautifully !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect given all the reviews about robot vacuums but this robot exceeded all expectations! I move him from floor to floor in our Town Home and he does an awesome job! If you're in the market for a robot vacuum, this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Matt

customer_reviews.title: This thing worked awesome for a year
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked awesome for a year. Then after that everything is falling apart. My warranty is no longer good so I'm stuck with a 600 Dollar piece of crap. Laser stop working, dirt bin button broke. Now it just runs around circles. Save your money don't buy this product. I wish I could upload a video on how it works now.
customer_reviews.author: computerjunkyz

customer_reviews.title: Not 5G compatible
customer_reviews.text: I love my Neato, I have hardwood floors and it does a superb job of cleaning the floors. I am always amazed at how much is in the dust bin at the end of the vac cycle. I am a bit disappointed that the does not use 5G but I hope a firmware update will be developed for that
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: We had a large German Shepherd (coated) with mid length fur. Having Tony (our botvac connected) vacuum 3 times a week kept up with the shedding. Story goes that Shepherds only shed once a year but it takes 365 days :). We bought a few brushes and a dozen filters so that I could clean them and reuse them. The changes made to the brush from previous models is perfect. With the bushing instead of exposed bearing the hair does not cause the vacuum and brush to self destruct. Great improvements.
customer_reviews.author: rhermsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that sheds. The idea of a robotic vacuum sounded too good to be true but the Neato delivers. This is our first one and I selected the Neato after reading the review on CNET. Consumer Reports neglected to review this one. It does what it is supposed to do. It vacuums the entire house including carpet, tile, and heavy rugs without a problem. The dirt receptacle is easy to dump. It goes under furniture and manuevers into corners, etc. I can't compare it to others as this is our first. The internet connection is nice but it is not a big issue as it can be scheduled easily without it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps pet hair and dark carpets
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! I have a dog and a cat and vacuum everyday. The Neato does an excellent job sweeping my carpets and hardwood floors. At first I was skeptical that it would not be able to climb onto the carpets. To my amazement, it sweeps very efficiently and leaves my carpets spotless. My rugs have a black background and the Neato has no difficulty cleaning darker carpets. Other top brands have reported that their robots can’t “see” the dark rugs. This product has met all of my expectations and more. I highly recommend buying this Neato.
customer_reviews.author: N. J.

customer_reviews.title: Best robot vacuum in the market.  We have owned three different brands.
customer_reviews.text: We don't have to babysit it. It has a turbo option which is great for carpet and the eco for hard floors. The trash bin is the biggest we have seen to date. Also has a true hepa filter. The Bluetooth option is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Julio S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: great for home with kids and dogs
customer_reviews.text: Two were purchased for gifts of families with dogs and kids. Both households have expressed how much they like this product. It works quietly, efficiently and methodically. Both are very happy with the thoroughness of the vacuuming. It is easy to empty the collection section.
customer_reviews.author: kewb

customer_reviews.title: Wife approved.
customer_reviews.text: Wife approved. [UPDATE] battery seems to be a bit less... it used to do a full cleaning in turbo mode without recharging, now it needed to recharge once with 1 room left (cleaned about 1200sqft area before recharging). The sensor seems to be a bit off too, now it occasionally getting stuck in corner with slight incline.
customer_reviews.author: Jianyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy twith the performance of my Neato BotVac. It has made a big difference in freeing up my time to do more important things other than sweeping up crumbs. I read many reviews before making a final choice and also read some critiques. It sometimes gets stuck in a tight place and has to be rescued, but aside from that, it's a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Diann C

customer_reviews.title: Keeps breaking down.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Broke down after 6 months. Called customer service replaced it, and stopped working again within 6 months for a different reason. Called customer service again and thy said its no longer within warranty because of the original purchase date despite being sent a defective product for a replacement. Don't waste your money. You're literally just renting a robot vaccum for no more than year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how we lived without our Neato! As a household with a lot of pets shedding everywhere, we pretty much had to give up wearing black clothes. Jaina eliminated that problem. Now all that hair ends up in her hopper instead of on our pants! Totally worth every penny I spent on her!
customer_reviews.author: Whytte D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Our newest best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was super skeptical at first but was hopeful, have been elated since. He cleans the hardwoods and carpets ever other day and we manually put him in our separate rooms as needed and just push the house clean button. I work from home and Eco is not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Finally keeping up with the leaves and dirt tracked in by my dogs! It covered the my whole 1500 square foot house in about 90 minutes. It’s pattern seems very random. I still feel like I need to go ahead of it and pick up area rugs, side tables, and the kitchen chairs. It might do well without, but I want to make sure it’s covering as much ground as possible. It doesn’t do very well at letting me know when the dirt container is full. It tends to back up. I like starting it with my echo. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cwanders

customer_reviews.title: This little guy does great helping me keep up
customer_reviews.text: Have a big house and live in a windy place...too much dust to vacuum on my own. This little guy does great helping me keep up. Had some battery trouble and Neato is sending me a new one. Good service!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I love this robot vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this robot vacuum cleaner. Its amazingly good when you have furbabies in the house. I didn't know my Golden shedded that much till my Neato picked up and continues to pick up his hair off the floor. My floor looks spotless now. I love the floor maps it sends me after the job is done. Little geeky that but impressive. The only thing I don't like are the magnetic strips that act as gatekeepers. They are large and ugly and I cannot see myself placing it anywhere visible - they're an eyesore. Else I'm one big happy ball of love for my Neato
customer_reviews.author: Ranjeetha Menon

customer_reviews.title: Got this unit January 2018. It was dead on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this unit January 2018. It was dead on arrival and would not charge. They sent us a new battery, didn't work, and are now sending a new unit. Not impressed with how long the customer service has been taking. Its been a headache trying to get this new unit for my mom. It was intended to be a gift and will be 30 days late. I will change this review if the vacuum works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Best Botvac yet
customer_reviews.text: I own a few of the previous gens, and this one is by far the best. Intelligence is great, programing is so simple to do on the phone. Yes it is loud, but if a vacuum isn't lout it isn't doing a good job. Simply program to vacuum when your away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah C Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, except if you have fringed rugs.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Neato Covac vacuum cleaner. Four stars because we have many throw rugs with fringe, and it gets caught in all of them and you have to reset it to continue cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Meotoole

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two different versions of Neato products and my experience is average to below average. The Bot gets easily stuck under chairs, tables and inclined surfaces. The major issue I have with this brand is that after a few uses the bot fails to return to home base and meanders around lost unable to locate the base even when passing right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a German shepherd and hardwood floors, we used to vacuum every single day, and still have tumbleweeds of hair rolling around the house. This robot picks up every piece of hair and gets into every single crevice in the house. It is much smarter than I expected. The mapping function on the app is also really cool. It allows you to see exactly where in your house the vacuum vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! It's a member of the family.
customer_reviews.text: It's been years and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! If it died I'd buy a replace neato in the same day. My house is nearly all carpet. I'm not sure how well it would clean large hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week of pure happiness I can't imagine my life without my neato connected! This bot is very smart. It navigates very well, has only been stuck once.... on a sock under my son's bed! I have hardwood, tile and carpet. Neato has no problem transitioning.
customer_reviews.author: CrhRN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Neato Botvac connected.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans under furniture where upright cannot reach. Does a good job, picks up a lot of dust and dirt. Very methodical, not just random paths. My husbands new job is watching the vacuum. Our friends are asking about it. I love it. It lets me know if it needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention ever! I have 3 inside dogs that shed, so I was hand vacuuming my house every day! Now I have at least an extra hour to do other things and honestly I don’t know if my floors have ever been this clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Neato Botvac Connected Wi-Fi Enabled Robot Vacuum, Compatible with Alexa
product_meta.description: Still pushing a vacuum let Neato Wi-Fi enabled Robot do the vacuuming for you. With the Neato app on your smartphone, you can start, schedule, and monitor your cleaning from wherever you are. D-shape with cornerclever-exclusive D-Shape with CornerClever technology gets to where dirt hides-in corners and along walls.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Wi-Fi connected for ultimate control — use the Neato app to clean your floors from wherever you are and receive notifications on the go.
D-Shape design with CornerClever technology cleans close to walls and into corners. Long lasting Li-Ion battery.
LaserSmart mapping and navigation with real-time object detection scans and maps the room, plans, and methodically cleans-instead of just bumping around.
Eco & Turbo mode — you choose. Eco gives a longer, quieter energy-saving clean. Turbo provides a super-powered cleaning-with maximum hair pickup.

For issues, please refer to the user manual or contact Neato support at 1-877-296-3286.All existing and new Botvac Connected customers will have access to the Amazon Alexa skill today in the US, UK and later this year in Germany

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars1,582 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Wi-Fi Enabled Robot Vacuum, INSTALLED: ULTRA Performance Filter, Combo Brush and Side Brush, Integrated Charge Base, power cord. Other in the box: Spiral Blade Brush, 1 EXTRA ULTRA Performance filter, cleaning tool, and boundary markers
